Voxeo Offers Advance Peek at Prophecy 9

Voxeo has announced the release of the latest version of their Prophecy platform.

Prophecy 9 includes a slew of new features, including (be still my heart) support for Linux. Iâ€™ve run VoiceXML platforms on Linux before, but I do not have fond memories of the install / maintenance process. The prospect of running a platform as easy to install and maintain as Prophecy on Linux is really exciting.
